#### PR description:
Verbatim backport of #43956.

This PR updates the NanoAOD `LHCInfoProducer` module to be able to use both old `LHCInfo` (for Run 2) and new `LHCInfoPer*` records (for Run 3).

#### PR validation:
See master PR.

Backport of #43956.
